bs-wikiexplorer-page-title:
Short label for row in ExtJS manager that displays the page title.
{{Identical|Title}}
bs-wikiexplorer-page-namespace:
Short label for row in ExtJS manager that displays the page namespace.
{{Identical|Namespace}}
bs-wikiexplorer-creation-date: Short label for row in ExtJS manager that displays the pages creation date.
bs-wikiexplorer-is-redirect:
Short label for row in ExtJS manager that displays if the page is a redirect.
{{Identical|Is redirect}}
bs-wikiexplorer-last-comment:
Short label for row in ExtJS manager that displays the pages last edit comment.
{{Identical|Last comment}}
bs-wikiexplorer-last-edit-time:
Short label for row in ExtJS manager that displays the pages last edit date.
{{Identical/Last edit}}
bs-wikiexplorer-page-size:
Short label for row in ExtJS manager that displays the page size.
{{Identical|Size}}
bs-wikiexplorer-last-author:
Short label for row in ExtJS manager that displays the pages last editor.
{{Identical|Last editor}}
bs-wikiexplorer-categories:
Short label for row in ExtJS manager that displays the page categories.
{{Identical|Categories}}
bs-wikiexplorer-linked-files:
Short label for row in ExtJS manager that displays the pages linked files.
{{Identical|Linked files}}
bs-wikiexplorer-linked-pages: Short label for row in ExtJS manager that displays the pages that link to this page.
apihelp-bs-wikiexplorer-store-descriptio:
{{doc-apihelp-description|bs-wikiexplorer-store}}
Description of the API endpoint that provides all data for the extension WikiExplorer
apihelp-bs-wikiexplorer-store-param-meta:
{{doc-apihelp-param|bs-wikiexplorer-store|metaLoaded}}
Description of the API parameter to indicate whether the MetaData has already been loaded.
